comment._content: It looks like fabric has been sewn around the photograph, creating a frame.

comment.author: 8110957@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called British Royal Families, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 57507843@N02
comment._content: This looks like the same sitting with Disderi circa 1867: www.npg.org.uk/collections/search/portrait/mw114249/Queen... There are several other portraits of her in the same dress, presumably at about the same time, by other photographers, but the Disderi sitting is the only one with this chair and headdress.
